big waste of time.. asshole uploader.. In this torrent you will find the following: Smallville, Heroes, Boondocks, and slow ass download speeds.. Why do people do that? People like this should be hung from their tiny testicles and be gutted like a stock pig.. FUCKIN ASSHOLE!

Downloaded the first episode, and so far so good.

Firekid42, zerosk8a, when you download a movie, if it hasn't finished downloading completely, you might see some parts of old deleted files on your disk. Have you recently watched / deleted Smallville, Heroes, Boondocks, ... ?
